title: Lag and connection issues since 5.4
body:
So ever since this patch i have been experiencing mass packet loss and server connection issues. i know my internet is not he problem because  i am still getting 10mb/sec. Also i am getting some frame drop issues. got loss prevented once yesterday so i know there must have been a problem with the server but today i have to keep reconnecting to game because it crashed before it even gets to the load screen. Anyone else?  

And can we get a red post acknowledging this.

replies.body: 2 mates of mine are having frame rate issues since the patch as of the 13th of march

>And can we get a red post acknowledging this.

Haven't seen one around here for a while, ignoring the most recent one talking about the server-wide issues.

It might just be a reverberation of the lag that once was. Basically, is this issue still affecting you a few days after?

Who's your ISP and what OS are you on?
